articles.title: Factbox: Harsh words, tough action: how companies have rebuffed Russia - Reuters
articles.description: Corporate actions to censure Russia after its invasion of Ukraine vary widely and include some measures required by law and some voluntary, with comments ranging from harsh condemnations to more measured promises to review business in the country.
articles.content: March 3 (Reuters) - Corporate actions to censure Russia after its invasion of Ukraine vary widely and include some measures required by law and some voluntary, with comments ranging from harsh condem… [+3528 chars]

articles.title: Russia's declining smartphone market may slip further in 2022 amid Ukraine invasion
articles.description: It fell 7% year over year in 2021
articles.content:
• Russia's smartphone market declined 7% year over year in 2021, according to Counterpoint Research.
  • Samsung dominated the market with a 30% share, followed by Xiaomi, Apple, and other … [+2183 chars]

articles.title: Airbnb is suspending operations in Russia and Belarus, CEO Brian Chesky announces
articles.description: Airbnb joins the likes of Apple, General Motors, Ikea, and Shell in pulling out of or suspending operations in Russia.
articles.content:
Airbnb is suspending operations in Russia and Belarus.
